questions.question: What is the chemical formula for X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α?
What type of structural transformation does X-pcu-1-Zn undergo when heated under nitrogen?
Is X-pcu-1-Zn-4i reversible to its original form after activation?
questions.answer: False, the transformation to X-pcu-1-Zn-4i appears to be irreversible.

questions.question: What triggers the structural isomerism in X-pcu-1-Zn?
questions.answer: Soaking of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α in CH3CN and subsequent heating.

questions.question: What is the BET surface area calculated from the 77 K N2 isotherm for X-pcu-1-Zn-4i?
Does X-pcu-1-Zn exhibit a shape memory effect?
questions.answer: True, X-pcu-1-Zn exhibits a shape memory effect.

questions.question: What is the role of dynamic vacuum in the transformation of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α?
questions.answer: It leads to the transformation of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α to X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-γ.

questions.question: What happens to X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α when exposed to air for one day followed by heating?
Can X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-δ revert back to X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α?
questions.answer: True, X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-δ can revert to X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α when soaked in DMF.

questions.question: What is the significance of the (101) face in the transformation of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α to X-pcu-1-Zn-4i?
questions.answer: Cracks occur along the (101) face during the transformation, suggesting it is affected by the transformation.

questions.question: What is the observed effect of heating X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α at 130 °C?
questions.answer: It results in the transformation to X-pcu-1-Zn-4i.

questions.question: Is the square paddlewheel node retained in X-pcu-1-Zn-4i?
questions.answer: True, the square paddlewheel node is retained in X-pcu-1-Zn-4i.

questions.question: What is the guest accessible volume of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α?
What is the change in guest accessible volume from X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α to X-pcu-1-Zn-4i?
Does X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-β revert to X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α after soaking in DMF?
questions.answer: True, X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-β reverts to X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α after soaking in DMF.

questions.question: What is the role of CH3CN in the transformation of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α?
questions.answer: It triggers the structural isomerism from X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α to X-pcu-2-Zn-3i.

questions.question: What is the observed effect of exposing X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α to air?
questions.answer: It leads to the transformation to X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-δ when followed by heating.

questions.question: Is the transformation of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α to X-pcu-1-Zn-4i reversible?
questions.answer: False, the transformation appears to be irreversible.

questions.question: What is the effect of dynamic vacuum on X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α?
What is the significance of the (101) plane in the transformation of X-pcu-1-Zn-3i-α?
questions.answer: The (101) plane has the highest density of metal coordination centres and is affected by the transformation.
